title: Agricultural Equipment POS Software
serial-description: To use the software, you need to enter a serial number and confirm. You can enter the serial number on the software CD.
error-server-network-message: Please check you server status. When server status is not open, server connection error will occur.

error-license-expired-message: License is Expired! Please contact with support team to update license
